channel.title: Death on Lemenio
channel.description: Recent content in Death on Lemenio

item.title: Next
item.description: The more we want to live, the less we are willing to fight. For death. It’s a great topic over there, lots of mature people advice young generations to think about that word several times. It does boost our life performance.

item.title: Death
item.description: Us, facing death every day. Even in our most brightest moment, it won’t leave us. Having endured with some depression and receive some supporation from friends, I have realized that there’s three session to confront with it.
